meaningMnemonic: You come across a <radical>spirit</radical> wearing a <radical>top hat</radical> and it claims to be your <kanji>ancestor</kanji>. Well of course, if you remember correctly, all of your ancestors wore top hats when they were alive. This spirit must be your long lost, great great... uh... somebody.
readingMnemonic: You ask your <kanji>ancestor</kanji> what it wants and it points to the <reading>so</reading>ap (そ) by the sink. Soap? It nods at you. I guess your ancestor is here to see the wonders of soap.
